dct_title_s: The Mexican and central states of America: together with the southern part of the United States of North America.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Includes inset map: Mexico and adjacent states, on an enlarged scale. Prime meridian: Greenwich. "Published by R.H. Laurie, Chart-seller and Agent to the Admiralty & c. No. 53, Fleet St., London, August 6th, 1827, Improved Edition: 1830." 1 map: col.; 64 x 98 cm. folded to 23 x 13 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
